title: Can’t Stop the Quiz
description: Put on your thinking caps. It’s America’s favorite game show.
quote: I’m Terry McTeer and I’ll be right here.
altHero: host Terry McTeer in his signature bowtie
alt1: early days of the show as Terry greets the contstants at their podiums
alt3: two contestants with very different final totals
alt4: set of the show with Terry and three contestants
